title: WHIRLING F2 / KLAASJE DOOR
description: When the dialogue with Klaasje is over you can go and click and her door.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "There's still a dent in the vinyl -..."
links.text: There's still a dent in the vinyl -- where you punched it before.

links.title: You: "Run your finger across the dent."
links.text: Run your finger across the dent.

links.title: Door, Room #3: "This little depression is all you c..."
links.text: This little depression is all you could inflict on the door.

links.title: Inland Empire: ""Why are you doing this? Don't do t..."
links.text: "Why are you doing this? Don't do this to me, please!" Remember? Who *was* that meant for?

links.title: You: "Knock..."
links.text: Knock...

links.title: Inland Empire: "White Mourning. It was mourning all..."
links.text: White Mourning. It was mourning all along. You should've seen it coming, it was right behind her eyes...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The words still echo in the hallway..."
links.text: The words still echo in the hallway...

links.title: You: "Fucking whore."
links.text: Fucking whore.

links.title: Half Light: "There we go-- *fucking whore*. What..."
links.text: There we go-- *fucking whore*. What a nice thing to say, Harry. Everything is A-Okay with you.

links.title: You: "Just knock again."
links.text: Just knock again.

links.title: Door, Room #3: "The door feels cold."
links.text: The door feels cold.

links.title: You: "Knock..."
links.text: Knock...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Caustic Echo. It was darkness all a..."
links.text: Caustic Echo. It was darkness all along. But you were young and it was summer. You just had to take a dive...

links.title: Inland Empire: "You're just as alone as the last ti..."
links.text: You're just as alone as the last time. Whatever kept you company in this world -- what kept you safe -- has left your side, never to return again.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Beauty has abandoned you in this ug..."
links.text: Beauty has abandoned you in this ugliness, honcho. And then some! You cannot even remember the *name* of beauty; what beauty was...

links.title: Inland Empire: "You swallow, like you swallowed the..."
links.text: You swallow, like you swallowed the last time. Whatever bitter emotion was swimming to the surface then -- and now -- subsides. Submerges. Sinks back into you.

links.title: You: "Knock."
links.text: Knock.

links.title: Door, Room #3: "There is no answer -- it's nighttim..."
links.text: There is no answer -- it's nighttime, officer.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "A young woman like this is probably..."
links.text: A young woman like this is probably out partying the night away. Drink and drugs, sweet drugs are involved. Loneliness begone...

links.title: Shivers: "In the Jamrock Quarter, The Paliseu..."
links.text: In the Jamrock Quarter, The Paliseum for music, company and men... or the Door To The River, for death and synthetic opiates. Or, way in the East in Couron, in a starlit *bo√Æte de nuits* like *La Cherte*... far from here and you, shivering dog.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should come back in the morning.""
links.text: "We should come back in the morning."

links.title: Door, Room #3: ""Who is it?" A woman's voice answer..."
links.text: "Who is it?" A woman's voice answers -- muffled by the door.

links.title: Drama: "Tired. Controlled."
links.text: Tired. Controlled.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is the police. Can we come in?""
links.text: "This is the police. Can we come in?"

links.title: Door, Room #3: ""Come on up -- the door is open!" S..."
links.text: "Come on up -- the door is open!" She shouts: "I'm drying my hair..."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Sounds like it's coming from upstai..."
links.text: Sounds like it's coming from upstairs somewhere -- you could snoop around before going up...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Somewhere not far from here the lie..."
links.text: Somewhere not far from here the lieutenant is preparing her file. "Klaasje Amandou," he writes. You realize the detective should be here for what comes next. It could prove... *dangerous* to go in alone.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: You: "Try the handle."
links.text: Try the handle.

links.title: Door, Room #3: "This door can only be opened with a..."
links.text: This door can only be opened with a key or from the inside.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "As you hold the metal you sense the..."
links.text: As you hold the metal you sense the warmth left there by her hand.

links.title: You: "Knock."
links.text: Knock.

links.title: Door, Room #3: "There is no answer."
links.text: There is no answer.

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear the shower being turned on..."
links.text: You hear the shower being turned on, somewhere inside.

links.title: Inland Empire: "A tremendous loneliness comes over..."
links.text: A tremendous loneliness comes over you. Everybody in the world is doing something without you.

links.title: You: ""I'm so alone.""
links.text: "I'm so alone."

links.title: Door, Room #3: "The door is indifferent to your lon..."
links.text: The door is indifferent to your loneliness. The world does not care.

links.title: You: ""Why are you doing this? Don't do t..."
links.text: "Why are you doing this? Don't do this to me..."

links.title: Door, Room #3: "The door is mute and indifferent. Y..."
links.text: The door is mute and indifferent. Your despair is a joke to it.

links.title: You: ""Beauty, don't abandon me in all th..."
links.text: "Beauty, don't abandon me in all this ugliness!"

links.title: Door, Room #3: "The door does not care."
links.text: The door does not care.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "The door probably thinks you're a h..."
links.text: The door probably thinks you're a has-been loser too. You feel your funny necktie becoming tighter and tighter around your neck...

links.title: You: "Swallow the emotion."
links.text: Swallow the emotion.

links.title: You: "Knock again."
links.text: Knock again.

links.title: Door, Room #3: "Still no answer."
links.text: Still no answer.

links.title: You: "Knock again, much harder."
links.text: Knock again, much harder.

links.title: Door, Room #3: "Still nothing."
links.text: Still nothing.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant gives you a quick gl..."
links.text: The lieutenant gives you a quick glance.

links.title: Empathy: "He doesn't like where this is going..."
links.text: He doesn't like where this is going.

links.title: Half Light: "You should punch a fucking hole in..."
links.text: You should punch a fucking hole in it.

links.title: You: ""Fucking whore!""
links.text: "Fucking whore!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hey! What is your problem?""
links.text: "Hey! What is your problem?"

links.title: Half Light: "That felt good. Everyone is a whore..."
links.text: That felt good. Everyone is a whore. Now punch a hole in the door.

links.title: Volition: "Don't. Everyone is a whore? What do..."
links.text: Don't. Everyone is a whore? What does that even mean? Breathe in and walk away.

links.title: You: "Punch the door."
links.text: Punch the door.

links.title: Door, Room #3: "You slam your fist into the vinyl...."
links.text: You slam your fist into the vinyl. It does not produce a hole. The door sits sturdily in the frame and your fist hurts. This was all a very good, normal thing to do.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Not to mention *great* exercise!"
links.text: Not to mention *great* exercise!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Stop that!" The lieutenant sounds..."
links.text: "Stop that!" The lieutenant sounds angry.

links.title: You: "Suppress the urge."
links.text: Suppress the urge.

links.title: Half Light: "The murmur in your ears recedes slo..."
links.text: The murmur in your ears recedes slowly, your breathing normalizes. That's one lucky door.

links.title: You: "Breathe in."
links.text: Breathe in.

links.title: Half Light: "You hear the murmur of blood in you..."
links.text: You hear the murmur of blood in your ears. Your back slowly relaxes when you breathe out. That's one lucky door.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
